name: Black Box Jumper Online v.1.5
description:
Black Box Jumper is a platformer with simple objective. Each level must be finished by collecting all keys in given time

Switch to 1.4 Online NOTES:

- Low fps is caused by the engine not being very good for html5 exports.

Try different browser if you have low fps.

- All limits are only because of the engine and platform (html5).

- Music may not play on the first run. To fix this go to options and disable then enable the music.

Get the full version: Level editor
